markdown:
**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 234 2.0 **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** 1 minute --- Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell. - **Cat Eyes** You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416). - **Claws** You gain a claw attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits. - **Jaws** You gain a jaws attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage and has the unarmed trait. --- **Heightened (4th)** Add the following options to the list you can choose from.
  • **Fish Tail** You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • **Owl Eyes** You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • **Wings** You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
name: Animal Feature

Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.
</summary>

summary_markdown: Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.
text: Animal Feature Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 234 2.0 Cast Single Action somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell. - Cat Eyes You gain low-light vision. - Claws You gain a claw attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits. - Jaws You gain a jaws attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage and has the unarmed trait. --- Heightened (4th) Add the following options to the list you can choose from. Fish Tail You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed. Owl Eyes You gain darkvision. Wings You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
